nodes.text: Bounty Hunters 5 is the fifth issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Bounty Hunters. It was written by Ethan Sacks, illustrated by Paolo Villanelli, and published by Marvel Comics on September 23, 2020. It features the story "Galaxy's Deadliest Part 5: The High Cost of Revenge," in which Boba Fett and Valance have their final confrontation with Nakano Lash.

BATTLE OF THE BOUNTY HUNTERS! Only one man can stop BOBA FETT from executing his long sought vengeance. But can VALANCE survive the battle of the two greatest bounty hunters of their age? Why did NAKANO LASH betray her team during their doomed mission to CORELLIA? The answer could ignite an all-out crime war across the underworld and change Valance's life forever.
